00141 template<typename PointDataTreeType>
00142 struct AppendAttributeOp {
00143 
00144     typedef typename tree::LeafManager<PointDataTreeType>       LeafManagerT;
00145     typedef typename LeafManagerT::LeafRange                    LeafRangeT;
00146     typedef AttributeSet::Descriptor::NameAndType               NameAndType;
00147 
00148     AppendAttributeOp(  PointDataTreeType& tree,
00149                         const NameAndType& newAttribute,
00150                         AttributeSet::DescriptorPtr& descriptor,
00151                         const bool hidden = false,
00152                         const bool transient = false,
00153                         const bool group = false)
00154         : mTree(tree)
00155         , mNewAttribute(newAttribute)
00156         , mDescriptor(descriptor)
00157         , mHidden(hidden)
00158         , mTransient(transient)
00159         , mGroup(group) { }
00160 
00161     void operator()(const LeafRangeT& range) const {
00162 
00163         for (typename LeafRangeT::Iterator leaf=range.begin(); leaf; ++leaf) {
00164 
00165             const AttributeSet::Descriptor& expected = leaf->attributeSet().descriptor();
00166 
00167             AttributeArray::Ptr attribute = leaf->appendAttribute(mNewAttribute, expected, mDescriptor);
00168 
00169             if (mHidden)      attribute->setHidden(true);
00170             if (mTransient)   attribute->setTransient(true);
00171 
00172             if (mGroup) {
00173                 GroupAttributeArray::cast(*attribute).setGroup(true);
00174             }
00175         }
00176     }
00177 
00179 
00180     PointDataTreeType&              mTree;
00181     const NameAndType&              mNewAttribute;
00182     AttributeSet::DescriptorPtr&    mDescriptor;
00183     const bool                      mHidden;
00184     const bool                      mTransient;
00185     const bool                      mGroup;
00186 }; // class AppendAttributeOp

00192 template<typename PointDataTreeType>
00193 struct DropAttributesOp {
00194 
00195     typedef typename tree::LeafManager<PointDataTreeType>       LeafManagerT;
00196     typedef typename LeafManagerT::LeafRange                    LeafRangeT;
00197     typedef std::vector<size_t>                                 Indices;
00198 
00199     DropAttributesOp(   PointDataTreeType& tree,
00200                         const Indices& indices,
00201                         AttributeSet::DescriptorPtr& descriptor)
00202         : mTree(tree)
00203         , mIndices(indices)
00204         , mDescriptor(descriptor) { }
00205 
00206     void operator()(const LeafRangeT& range) const {
00207 
00208         for (typename LeafRangeT::Iterator leaf=range.begin(); leaf; ++leaf) {
00209 
00210             const AttributeSet::Descriptor& expected = leaf->attributeSet().descriptor();
00211 
00212             leaf->dropAttributes(mIndices, expected, mDescriptor);
00213         }
00214     }
00215 
00217 
00218     PointDataTreeType&              mTree;
00219     const Indices&                  mIndices;
00220     AttributeSet::DescriptorPtr&    mDescriptor;
00221 }; // class DropAttributesOp

00227 template<typename PointDataTreeType>
00228 struct BloscCompressAttributesOp {
00229 
00230     typedef typename tree::LeafManager<PointDataTreeType>       LeafManagerT;
00231     typedef typename LeafManagerT::LeafRange                    LeafRangeT;
00232     typedef std::vector<size_t>                                 Indices;
00233 
00234     BloscCompressAttributesOp(  PointDataTreeType& tree,
00235                                 const Indices& indices)
00236         : mTree(tree)
00237         , mIndices(indices) { }
00238 
00239     void operator()(const LeafRangeT& range) const {
00240 
00241         for (typename LeafRangeT::Iterator leaf=range.begin(); leaf; ++leaf) {
00242 
00243             for (Indices::const_iterator    it = mIndices.begin(),
00244                                             itEnd = mIndices.end(); it != itEnd; ++it) {
00245 
00246                 AttributeArray& array = leaf->attributeArray(*it);
00247                 array.compress();
00248             }
00249         }
00250     }
00251 
00253 
00254     PointDataTreeType&              mTree;
00255     const Indices&                  mIndices;
00256 }; // class BloscCompressAttributesOp

00265 template <typename PointDataTree>
00266 inline void appendAttribute(PointDataTree& tree,
00267                             const AttributeSet::Util::NameAndType& newAttribute,
00268                             Metadata::Ptr defaultValue,
00269                             const bool hidden, const bool transient, const bool group)
00270 {
00271     typedef AttributeSet::Util::NameAndTypeVec                    NameAndTypeVec;
00272     typedef AttributeSet::Descriptor                              Descriptor;
00273 
00274     using point_attribute_internal::AppendAttributeOp;
00275 
00276     typename PointDataTree::LeafCIter iter = tree.cbeginLeaf();
00277 
00278     if (!iter)  return;
00279 
00280     // do not append a non-unique attribute
00281 
00282     const Descriptor& descriptor = iter->attributeSet().descriptor();
00283     const size_t index = descriptor.find(newAttribute.name);
00284 
00285     if (index != AttributeSet::INVALID_POS) {
00286         OPENVDB_THROW(KeyError, "Cannot append an attribute with a non-unique name - " << newAttribute.name << ".");
00287     }
00288 
00289     // create a new attribute descriptor
00290     NameAndTypeVec vec;
00291     vec.push_back(newAttribute);
00292 
00293     Descriptor::Ptr newDescriptor = descriptor.duplicateAppend(vec);
00294 
00295     // store the attribute default value in the descriptor metadata
00296 
00297     if (defaultValue) {
00298         newDescriptor->setDefaultValue(newAttribute.name, *defaultValue);
00299     }
00300 
00301     // insert attributes using the new descriptor
00302 
00303     AppendAttributeOp<PointDataTree> append(tree, newAttribute, newDescriptor, hidden, transient, group);
00304     tbb::parallel_for(typename tree::template LeafManager<PointDataTree>(tree).leafRange(), append);
00305 }
00306

00310 
00311 template <typename PointDataTree>
00312 inline void dropAttributes( PointDataTree& tree,
00313                             const std::vector<size_t>& indices)
00314 {
00315     typedef typename tree::LeafManager<PointDataTree>       LeafManagerT;
00316     typedef AttributeSet::Descriptor                        Descriptor;
00317 
00318     using point_attribute_internal::DropAttributesOp;
00319 
00320     typename PointDataTree::LeafCIter iter = tree.cbeginLeaf();
00321 
00322     if (!iter)  return;
00323 
00324     const Descriptor& descriptor = iter->attributeSet().descriptor();
00325 
00326     // throw if position index present in the indices as this attribute is mandatory
00327 
00328     const size_t positionIndex = descriptor.find("P");
00329     if (positionIndex!= AttributeSet::INVALID_POS &&
00330         std::find(indices.begin(), indices.end(), positionIndex) != indices.end()) {
00331         OPENVDB_THROW(KeyError, "Cannot drop mandatory position attribute.");
00332     }
00333 
00334     // insert attributes using the new descriptor
00335 
00336     Descriptor::Ptr newDescriptor = descriptor.duplicateDrop(indices);
00337     tbb::parallel_for(LeafManagerT(tree).leafRange(), DropAttributesOp<PointDataTree>(tree, indices, newDescriptor));
00338 }

00344 template <typename PointDataTree>
00345 inline void dropAttributes( PointDataTree& tree,
00346                             const std::vector<Name>& names)
00347 {
00348     typename PointDataTree::LeafCIter iter = tree.cbeginLeaf();
00349 
00350     if (!iter)  return;
00351 
00352     const AttributeSet& attributeSet = iter->attributeSet();
00353     const AttributeSet::Descriptor& descriptor = attributeSet.descriptor();
00354 
00355     std::vector<size_t> indices;
00356 
00357     for (std::vector<Name>::const_iterator it = names.begin(), itEnd = names.end(); it != itEnd; ++it) {
00358         const size_t index = descriptor.find(*it);
00359 
00360         // do not attempt to drop an attribute that does not exist
00361         if (index == AttributeSet::INVALID_POS) {
00362             OPENVDB_THROW(KeyError, "Cannot drop an attribute that does not exist - " << *it << ".");
00363         }
00364 
00365         indices.push_back(index);
00366     }
00367 
00368     dropAttributes(tree, indices);
00369 }
00370

00375 template <typename PointDataTree>
00376 inline void dropAttribute(  PointDataTree& tree,
00377                             const size_t& index)
00378 {
00379     std::vector<size_t> indices;
00380     indices.push_back(index);
00381     dropAttributes(tree, indices);
00382 }

00385 template <typename PointDataTree>
00386 inline void dropAttribute(  PointDataTree& tree,
00387                             const Name& name)
00388 {
00389     std::vector<Name> names;
00390     names.push_back(name);
00391     dropAttributes(tree, names);
00392 }

00398 template <typename PointDataTree>
00399 inline void renameAttributes(   PointDataTree& tree,
00400                                 const std::vector<Name>& oldNames,
00401                                 const std::vector<Name>& newNames)
00402 {
00403     if (oldNames.size() != newNames.size()) {
00404         OPENVDB_THROW(ValueError, "Mis-matching sizes of name vectors, cannot rename attributes.");
00405     }
00406 
00407     typedef AttributeSet::Descriptor                        Descriptor;
00408 
00409     typename PointDataTree::LeafIter iter = tree.beginLeaf();
00410 
00411     if (!iter)  return;
00412 
00413     const AttributeSet& attributeSet = iter->attributeSet();
00414     const Descriptor& descriptor = attributeSet.descriptor();
00415     AttributeSet::DescriptorPtr newDescriptor(new Descriptor(descriptor));
00416 
00417     for (size_t i = 0; i < oldNames.size(); i++) {
00418         const Name oldName(oldNames[i]);
00419         if (descriptor.find(oldName) == AttributeSet::INVALID_POS) {
00420             OPENVDB_THROW(KeyError, "Cannot find requested attribute - " << oldName << ".");
00421         }
00422 
00423         const Name newName(newNames[i]);
00424         if (descriptor.find(newName) != AttributeSet::INVALID_POS) {
00425             OPENVDB_THROW(KeyError, "Cannot rename attribute as new name already exists - " << newName << ".");
00426         }
00427 
00428         const AttributeArray* array = attributeSet.getConst(oldName);
00429         assert(array);
00430 
00431         if (GroupAttributeArray::isGroup(*array)) {
00432             OPENVDB_THROW(KeyError, "Cannot rename group attribute - " << oldName << ".");
00433         }
00434 
00435         newDescriptor->rename(oldName, newName);
00436     }
00437 
00438     for (; iter; ++iter) {
00439         iter->renameAttributes(descriptor, newDescriptor);
00440     }
00441 }
00442 
00443 
00444 template <typename PointDataTree>
00445 inline void renameAttribute(PointDataTree& tree,
00446                             const Name& oldName,
00447                             const Name& newName)
00448 {
00449     std::vector<Name> oldNames;
00450     std::vector<Name> newNames;
00451     oldNames.push_back(oldName);
00452     newNames.push_back(newName);
00453     renameAttributes(tree, oldNames, newNames);
00454 }

00460 template <typename PointDataTree>
00461 inline void bloscCompressAttribute( PointDataTree& tree,
00462                                     const Name& name)
00463 {
00464     using point_attribute_internal::BloscCompressAttributesOp;
00465 
00466     typedef typename tree::LeafManager<PointDataTree>       LeafManagerT;
00467     typedef AttributeSet::Descriptor                        Descriptor;
00468 
00469     typename PointDataTree::LeafCIter iter = tree.cbeginLeaf();
00470 
00471     if (!iter)  return;
00472 
00473     const Descriptor& descriptor = iter->attributeSet().descriptor();
00474 
00475     // throw if index cannot be found in descriptor
00476 
00477     const size_t index = descriptor.find(name);
00478     if (index == AttributeSet::INVALID_POS) {
00479         OPENVDB_THROW(KeyError, "Cannot find requested attribute - " << name << ".");
00480     }
00481 
00482     // blosc compress attributes
00483 
00484     std::vector<size_t> indices;
00485     indices.push_back(index);
00486 
00487     tbb::parallel_for(LeafManagerT(tree).leafRange(), BloscCompressAttributesOp<PointDataTree>(tree, indices));
00488 }
